questions: What software prerequisites are needed to start working on Tracardi GUI?
What command is used to clone the Tracardi GUI source code from GitHub?
What command is used to install all project dependencies?
answer:
## Software prerequisites
* Docker
* Node
* Yarn
* VSCode or WebStorm
* Git

To start working on Tracardi GUI clone tracardi-gui repo.

```bash
git clone http://github.com/tracardi/tracardi-gui  #(1)
```

1. Clones GUI source code from GitHub

Then run:

```bash
yarn install  #(1)
```

1. This will install all project dependencies.
